name: Maps of Bombay curated by the amche-goa community

layers.title: Bombay Guide Map (1933)
layers.description: Published under the direction of Colner H.J.Couchman, Officiating Surveyor General of India, 1933

layers.title: Admiralty Chart of Bombay Harbor (1879)
layers.description: British Admiralty nautical chart of Bombay Harbor prepared in 1879. Originally published in 1864 under Captain G. H. Richards, updated periodically until 1879. Shows extraordinary detail of Bombay harbor with individual buildings, piers, docks, lighthouses, and depth soundings.
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: British Admiralty Chart No. 2621 via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain

layers.title: Murphy Map of Island of Bombay and Colaba (1843)
layers.description: Historical map of the Island of Bombay and Colaba from 1843
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: 1843 Murphy Map of Island of Bombay and Colaba via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain

layers.title: Map of Bombay (1816)
layers.description: Historical map of the Island of Bombay and Colaba from 1816
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons: 1843 Murphy Map of Island of Bombay and Colaba via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain

layers.title: Niebuhr's Map of Bombay (1764)
layers.description: Map by Carsten Niebuhr, a Danish traveler and scholar who was part of the Danish East India Company's expedition to the region.
layers.attribution: Wikimedia Commons/British Library: Bombay Niebuhr's Map 1764 via Wikimaps Warper released in public domain
